desires.description: Improve client engagement and streamline post-project support systems for Precision Solutions.
Increase Precision Solutions' annual revenue to $2M by the end of 2025.
Develop an AI-powered supply chain optimization tool by 2026.
Complete Lean Six Sigma Black Belt certification by Q3 2025.
Reduce client onboarding time by 75% within the next six months.
Host first leadership workshop by mid-2025.
Achieve a 20% increase in client retention within 1 year.
Publish a book on data-driven leadership.
Create a legacy of professional excellence and community impact.
Strengthen personal relationships with family by ensuring they feel prioritized.
